titles.title: Honoring United Parcel Service and its 100 years of commitment and leadership in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 110-233.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 87.

action.text: Ms. Johnson, E. B. moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 375.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

bill.summary: 7/16/2007--Passed House amended. (This measure has not been amended since it was reported to the House on July 13, 2007. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Recognizes United Parcel Service's role in the global transportation system as the world's largest package delivery company. Celebrates its 100th anniversary.
